flavorText: If a tree fells you in the forest and no one is around to hear it, "does it make a sound" is the last thing you need to worry about.

foreignData.flavorText: Wenn ein Baum dich im Wald umhaut und niemand in der Nähe ist, der es hört, ist „macht es Geräusche" das Letzte, worüber du dir Sorgen machen musst.

name: Burlfist Oak
originalText: Whenever you draw a card, Burlfist Oak gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

rulings.text: If a spell or ability causes a player to put a card into their hand without specifically using the word “draw,” it's not a card drawn.
